Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Game
public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
a class that represents a game and its features

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  Game.Ai
    The Ai class represents an artificial player that plays in a game according to certain rules defined in the class Game

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static CardEffect cardEffect
    Determines the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card.
    private static Deck deck
    Field containing the Deck from which the card are drawn
    private int draw
    How many card a player has to draw their turn.
    private static GameOverConditions gameOverConditions
    Determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game
    private boolean hasPlayerDrawn
    Checks if player has drawn a card this turn
    private boolean hasPlayerPlayed
    Checks if player has played a card this turn
    private boolean isClockwise
    sets whether the order of players turns is to be decided in a clockwise direction or not.
    private Player p1
    The human player
    static java.util.LinkedList<Card> pile
    Field containing the discard pile where the Cards played are discarded
    static Entity[] players
    An array with all the players playing the game
    private int skip
    How many turns have to be skipped
    private int turn
    The current turn
    private boolean uno
    Checks if player has pressed the uno button this turn
    private static ValidPlay validPlay
    Determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if the human player has played according to the rules

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Initializes a newly created Ai object by: refilling the deck with card in the pile if there are some from the previous Game instance; gets the logged player; creates the 3 Ais; initializes the players array; gives 7 cards to the HAND of each player; and puts the first card of the deck in the pile and activates its effect, unless the card's value is a DRAW4 in which case it's put back in the deck and another card is drawn.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void aiTurn()
    Makes the Ais play until its the turn of the human player.

    Check if a player can pass their turn or if the game is concluded because someone won

    void pass()
    Passes the turn if it can and notifies the observers

    Checks if the human player can draw and if they can they will and it will also update the observers.

    Checks if the human player plays a valid Card according to the rules and if it is the card is put in the pile and its effect is activated.

    Changes the value of the field uno to true (or pressed) for the human player turn and updates the observers.

    Sets the behavior for this game according to the gamemode selected
    (package private) void setHasPlayerPlayed​(boolean played)  
    private void win()
    Gives the human player exp according to the cards in the HAND of the Ais, increases their victory field by 1 and saves the changes

      Determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game

    • validPlay

      private static ValidPlay validPlay
      Determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if the human player has played according to the rules

    • cardEffect

      private static CardEffect cardEffect
      Determines the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card.

    • deck

      private static final Deck deck
      Field containing the Deck from which the card are drawn

    • pile

      public static final java.util.LinkedList<Card> pile
      Field containing the discard pile where the Cards played are discarded

    • uno

      private boolean uno
      Checks if player has pressed the uno button this turn

    • draw

      private int draw
      How many card a player has to draw their turn. Used in the functional interfaces ValidPlayChaos and CardEffectChaos

    • hasPlayerPlayed

      private boolean hasPlayerPlayed
      Checks if player has played a card this turn

    • hasPlayerDrawn

      private boolean hasPlayerDrawn
      Checks if player has drawn a card this turn

    • isClockwise

      private boolean isClockwise
      sets whether the order of players turns is to be decided in a clockwise direction or not. The value is true for Clockwise, false for Counterclockwise

    • turn

      private int turn
      The current turn

    • skip

      private int skip
      How many turns have to be skipped

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Initializes a newly created Ai object by: refilling the deck with card in the pile if there are some from the previous Game instance; gets the logged player; creates the 3 Ais; initializes the players array; gives 7 cards to the HAND of each player; and puts the first card of the deck in the pile and activates its effect, unless the card's value is a DRAW4 in which case it's put back in the deck and another card is drawn.

      Returns:

    • aiTurn

      public void aiTurn()
      Makes the Ais play until its the turn of the human player. Also updates the observers if an Ai remains with 1 card in HAND

    • changeColor

      void changeColor​(Card playedCard)
      Changes the color of the played card if its a card that can change color. In case its the human player that played the card the notify method will be called for the observers.
      Parameters:
      playedCard -

    • playerDraw

      public void playerDraw​(Entity e, int n)
      Checks if the human player can draw and if they can they will and it will also update the observers.
      Parameters:
      e -
      n -

    • canPass

      private boolean canPass()
      Check if a player can pass their turn or if the game is concluded because someone won
      Returns:

    • pass

      public void pass()
      Passes the turn if it can and notifies the observers

    • playerPlay

      public void playerPlay​(Card discard)
      Checks if the human player plays a valid Card according to the rules and if it is the card is put in the pile and its effect is activated. Also checks if the player has pressed UNO in the case it has 2 cards before playing and if they haven't they draw 2 cards. There is a notify in case of: a valid play, an invalid play and an UNO not pressed when it should.
      Parameters:
      discard -

    • pressUno

      public void pressUno()
      Changes the value of the field uno to true (or pressed) for the human player turn and updates the observers.

    • win

      private void win()
      Gives the human player exp according to the cards in the HAND of the Ais, increases their victory field by 1 and saves the changes

    • loss

      private void loss()
      Gives the human player 20 exp, increases their losses field by 1 and saves the changes
